Rayon Sports vs AS Kigali

Rayon Sports 0-1 AS Kigali

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:25

Rayon Sports ikomeje muri 1/8 kuri penaliti 4-2

Rayon Sports itsindiye kugera mu cyiciro gikurikira cy'Igikombe cy'Amahoro ari cyo 1/8 nyuma yo gutsinda AS Kigali kuri penaliti 4-2. Bishira Latif na Kalanda Frank ni bo bahushije izi penaliti ku ruhande rw'ikipe y'Abanyamujyi.

AS Kigali na yo hari icyizere cyinshi ko izagaragara muri 1/8 nk'ikipe yatsinzwe bidakabije kuko itsindiwe kuri penaliti. Mu makipe 19 ari gukina igikombe cy'Amahoro (utabariyemo Sunrise FC yikuye mu irushanwa), hazasezererwa atatu gusa kugira ngo haboneke 16 akina 1/8.

17:23

Rayon Sports yinjije penaliti ya kane

Umunya-Ghana Donkor Prosper yinjije penaliti ya kane ya Rayon Sports ku mupira ateye ukorwaho na Bate ukomeza mu izamu.

17:22

AS Kigali yinjije penaliti ya kane

Nininahazwe Fabrice 'Messi' yinjije penaliti ya kane ya AS Kigali.

17:21

Rayon Sports yinjije penaliti ya gatatu

Manishimwe Djabel ateye penaliti ya gatatu ya Rayon Sports, ayinjiza neza,

17:21

AS Kigali ihushije penaliti ya gatatu

Frank Kalanda ateye penaliti ya gatatu ya AS Kigali igenda hasi, ifatwa na Bikorimana

17:20

Rayon Sports yinjije penaliti ya kabiri

Bukuru Christophe ateye penaliti ya kabiri ya Rayon Sports ijya mu izamu

17:19

AS Kigali ihushije penaliti ya kabiri

Bishira Latif ateye penaliti ya kabiri ya AS KIgali ijya hejuru y'izamu

17:18

Rayon Sports yinjije penaliti ya mbere

Michael Sarpong yinjije penaliti ya mbere. Bate na we ntashoboye kugera ku mupira.

17:16

AS Kigali yinjije penaliti

Penaliti ya mbere ya AS Kigali itewe na Ntamuhanga Tumaini Tity ijya mu izamu

17:15

AS Kigali ni yo ibanza gutera penaliti

Penaliti ya mbere iraza guterwa na AS Kigali. Umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports agiye mu izamu riri ahagana ku marembo manini ya Stade ya Kigali.

17:11

Agashya i Nyamirambo

Umukino urarangiye mu gihe abari ku kibuga twari dutegereje penaliti, abakinnyi bahita bisubirira mu rwambariro. Komiseri w'umukino ni we umanutse abwira abasifuzi ati "Kuki mbona bagiye kandi banganya mu mikino yombi?"

Bahise babagarura nyamara bamwe bari bamaze kwiyambura imyambaro n'inkweto.

17:07

Umukino urarangiye: Hagiye guterwa penaliti

Umukino urangiye AS Kigali itsinze igitego 1-0. Na Rayon Sports yari yatsinze igitego 1-0 mu mukino wabaye ku wa Kabiri. Bivuze ko amakipe yombi anganya igitego 1-1 mu mikino yombi, hagiye guhita hitabazwa penaliti.

17:06

90+5' Umukino uhagazeho gato

Mu gihe Rayon Sports ikomeje kotsa igitutu AS Kigali muri iyi minota ya nyuma, abakinnyi ba AS Kigali bari gukoresha uburyo bwose bushoboka ngo barye iminota.Hari umukinnyi wayo uryamye imbere y'izamu rye, arikwitabwaho n'abaganga.

17:02

90+2' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Ishimwe Kevin wa AS Kigali ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gutinda gutera umupira wari uteretse muri koruneri.

17:01

90' AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ishimwe Kevin ahawe umupira, aragenda acenga umunyezamu Bikorimana Gerard, agiye gutea umupira mu izamu ryambaye ubusa, umupira ushyirwa muri koruneri na Mutsinzi Ange.

17:00

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi yerekanye iminota itanu y'inyongera

16:58

86' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Mudeyi Suleiman asimbuwe na Tuyishime Eric 'Congolais' bombi bakina hagati mu kibuga n'ubwo Mudeyi we akunda guca ku mpande. Amakipe yombi akomeje gushaka igitego muri iyi minota ya nyuma.

16:55

84' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Ssentongo Farouk Saifi asimbuwe na Ishimwe Kevin wabanje ku ntebe y'abasimbura ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali. Mu gihe umukino warangira gutya, harahita hitabazwa penaliti.

16:51

80' AS Kigali ihushije igitego

AS Kigali ihererekanyije inshuro nka zirindwi Rayon Sports idakoraho, Nininahazwe Fabrice atera umupira ukomeye mu izamu, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Bikorimana Gerard.

16:46

76' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports ikomeje gusatira ishaka igitego cyo kwishyura. Mugisha Gilbert ahinduye umupira ukomeye mu izamu ufatwa na Bate Shamiru abanje kwiyongeza.

16:43

72' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Nshimiyimana Marc Govin wa AS Kigali ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gutinda kurengura umupira.

16:41

69' Amakipe yombi ari gusatirana

Benedata Janvier yinjiranye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, awutanze kuri Kalanda na Farouk habura uwugeraho mu gihe Rayon Sports ihise ikora contre-attaque, Michael Sarpong ateye umupira ufatwa na Bate Shamiru.

16:36

65' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Manzi Thierry ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Frank Kalanda. Ikosa rihanwe na Nova Bayama umupira urenzwa n'abakinnyi ba AS Kigali.

16:31

60' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Manzi Thierry akiniye nabi Frank Kalanda, ikosa rihanwe na Nova Bayama umupira awutera hejuru kure mu kirere.

16:27

56' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Ntamuhanga Tumaini akoreye ikosa kuri Manishimwe Djabel, hatangwa coup-franc itewe na Manzi Thierry, umupira ukurwaho na myugariro wa AS Kigali n'umutwe.

16:25

55' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Ssentongo Saifi ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Donkor Prosper n'ubwo umukino wari wakomeje kuko umupira wahise ufatwa na Djabel.

16:23

54' AS Kigali irugarijwe

Bukuru Christophe atanze umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina ashaka Michael Sarpong, umupira ukurwaho na Niyomugabo Claude awutera muri koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

16:17

47' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong asimbuye Habimana Hussein ukina inyuma. Mutsinzi na Manzi ni bo bagiye gusigara mu mutima wa ba myugariro, Irambona na Radu bakina inyuma ku ruhande.

16:15

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Mu gihe Michael Sarpong wari wabanje hanze, yitegura gusimbura, Rayon Sports itangije igice cya kabiri cy'umukino.

16:00

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

15:58

45+1' Gusimbuza kwa AS Kigali

Cyitegetse Bogard wavunitse, asimbuwe na Nininahazwe Fabrice uzwi nka Messi.

15:57

45' Iminota y'inyongera

Mu gihe Cyitetse Bogard amaze iminota irenga ine avurirwa mu kibuga, umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota ibiri y'inyongera. Bogard asohowe ku ngobyi.

15:55

Ku bindi bibuga

HT: Unity SC 0-1 Mukura
HT: Gasogi United 0-0 Hope FC

15:53

41' Umukiino uhagaze gato

Cyitegetse Bogard wa AS Kigali aryamye hasi mu kibuga hagati aho arimo kwitabwaho n'abaganga nyuma yo kugwangwa n'umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports, Manishimwe Djabel wahawe ikarita y'umuhondo.

15:49

36' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Irambona Eric akiniye nabi Nshimiyimana Marc Govin, ikosa rihanwe na Nova Bayama umupira ukurwaho na ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports.

15:45

33' AS Kigali ikomeje gusatira

Ssentongo Farouq na Kalanda bakomeje gushaka uburyo batsindira ikipe yabo igitego cya kabiri muri iki gice cya mbere, ariko abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports bakitambika.

15:40

28' Igitego cya AS Kigali

Manzi Thierry atakaje umupira ufashwe na Frank Kalanda arazamuka yinjira mu rubuga rw'amahina, anyuza umupira hagati y'abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports ugera kuri Benedata Janvier wari uhagaze mu rubuga rw'amahina, atera mu nguni hasi, aho umunyezamu Bikorimana atabasha kugera. Ubu ni igitego 1-1 mu mikino yombi.

15:37

26' AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ku mupira bazamukanye kuri contre-attaque, abakinnyi ba AS Kigali bananiwe kubyaza umusaruro ubu buryo, Cyitegetse Bogard atera umupira ugiye muri koruneri.

15:36

25' Amateka y'amakipe yombi mu gikombe cy'Amahoro

Kuva iri rushanwa ryiswe Igikombe cy'Amahoro mu 1995, Rayon Sports imaze kuryegukana inshuro eshatu; 1998, 2005 na 2016 mu gihe AS Kigali irifite inshuro imwe mu 2013.

Mu mwaka ushize, Rayon Sports yatsindiwe ku mukino wa nyuma na Mukura Victory Sports mu gihe AS Kigali yakuwemo na Mukura muri 1/8.


15:29

17' Rayon Sports ihushije uburyo bwiza

Mudeyi Suleiman ahaye umupira Bukuru Christophe na we awutanga kuri Iradukunda Eric uwuhinduye mu rubuga rw'amahina, Mugisha Gilbert ashyizeho umutwe ujya hejuru.

Mudeyi yari ahawe undi mupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, ushyirwa muri koruneri na Bishira Latif.

15:25

13' AS Kigali ihushije uburyo bwiza

Donkor Prosper atakaje umupira mu kibuga hagati aho yibwiraga ko umusifuzi Nsoro yabonye ko yakorewe ikosa, ufatwa na Cyitetse Bogard uzamukanye umupira ateye mu izamu ukora ku mukinnyi wa Rayon Sports uhita ufatwa na Bikorimana.

15:18

6' Rayon Sports yari ibonye uburyo bwiza

Manishimwe Djabel akinannye na Manzi Thierry bahana ikosa rikorewe kuri Mugisha Gilbert, umupira utewe mu izamu ufatwa neza na Bate Shamiru.

15:17

5' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Bishira Latif akiniye nabi Mugisha Gilbert inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina, ntiyishimira icyemezo gifashwe na Nsoro, amuhaikarita y'umuhondo.

15:16

4' AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Nova Bayama uri guhura na Rayon Sports yavuyemo muri Mutarama, acenze Habimana Hussein, ahindura umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, Frank Kalanda akozeho gato umupira uramutenguha ukomeza imbere y'izamu.

Niyomugabo Claude na we ateye umupira muremutre ufatwa na Bikorimana.

15:14

2' Gusatira kwa AS Kigali

Ikipe y'Umujyi wa Kigali itangiye isatira ngo irebe ko yakwishyura igitego yatsinzwe u mu mukino ubanza hakiri kare. Nshimiyimana Marc Govin ahinduye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina ufatwa neza na Bikorimana Gerard.

15:11

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi wo hagati, Ruzindana Nsoro atangije umukino. Frank Kalanda atera umupira wa mbere, akinana na bagenzi be barimo Ruhinda Farouq uhise umusubiza umupira, abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports barawumukoresha urarenga.


Rayon Sports yambaye imyenda yayo y'umweru mu gihe AS Kigali yambaye umuhondo.

15:05

Amakipe yombi yishyushya

14:50

Tombora ya 1/8 izaba kuri uyu wa Gatanu

Ishyirahamwe ry'Umupira w'Amaguru mu Rwanda, FERWAFA, rivuga ko tombora ya buri cyiciro izajya ihita iba nyuma y'umukino uzajya usoza icyiciro kiri gukina.

Iyi mikino y'amajonjora izakomeza ejo, ari nabwo izasozwa, hahite haba tombora ya 1/8.

Amakipe atatu muri 19 ari gukina iri rushanwa ni yo azasezererwa gusa!

14:46

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku mpande zombi

Rayon Sports: Bikorimana Gerard, Manzi Thierry, Irambona Eric, Mutsinzi Ange, Donkor Prosper, Habimana Hussein, Iradukunda Eric, Bukuru Christophe, Mudeyi Suleiman, Mugisha Gilbert, na Manishimwe Djabel.

Umutoza: Wagner do Nascimento

AS Kigali: Shamiru Bate, Ntamuhanga Tumaine, Niyomugabo Claude, Rurangwa Mossi, Bishira Latif, Benedata Janvier, Nshimiyimana Marc Govin, Farouq Saifi Ssentongo, Nova Bayama, Frank Kalanda, Cyitegetse Bogard.

Umutoza: Mateso Jean De Dieu

14:45

Uko amakipe yari yatsindanye mu mikino ibanza yabaye ku wa Kabiri

Hope FC 2-2 Gasogi United
AS Kigali 0-1 Rayon Sports FC
Mukura VS 3-0 Unity SC
Interforce FC 0-3 Intare FC
Sunrise FC vs Espoir FC (Sunrise Fc yikuye mu irushanwa, Espoir FC irakomeza)

14:44

Imikino iteganyijwe uyu munsi

Gasogi United vs Hope FC (Stade Kicukiro, 15h00)
Rayon Sports FC vs AS Kigali (Stade de Kigali, 15h00)
Unity SC vs Mukura VS (Mageragere, 15h00)
Intare FC vs Interforce FC (Stade Mumena, 15h00)

14:43

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino wo kwishyura mu ijonjora ribanza ry'igikombe cy'Amahoro 2019 hagati ya Rayon Sports na AS Kigali.

AS Kigali yatsinzwe igitego 1-0 mu mukino ubanza wabaye ku wa Kabiri.
